NK037(ji)017:1: // rnam sras ser chen sprin gseb ma'i sgrub thabs rjes gnang dang bcas pa bzhugs /
NK037(ji)017:3: rgyal ba'i bka' yi bstan srung mchog /
NK037(ji)017:4: rin chen mang sprul rnam thos sras //
NK037(ji)017:5: de la btud nas sgrub thab dang //
NK037(ji)017:6: rjes gnang cho ga mdo tsam bshad //
NK037(ji)017:7: 'dir rnam thos sras ser chen sprin gseb ma'i sgrub
NK037(ji)017:8: thabs dang 'brel bar rjes gnang gi cho ga sgrub
NK037(ji)017:10: sbyor ba yo byad kyi bshom /
NK037(ji)017:11: dngos gzhi sgrub pa'i thabs dang /
NK037(ji)017:13: dang po yo byad bsham pa ni /
NK037(ji)017:15: bris sku sogs rten bkram pa'i mdun du /
NK037(ji)017:16: stegs bu dri bzang gis byugs pa'i khar man+dala sgo
NK037(ji)017:17: rdzogs khor sa gsum pa sgom don dang mthun pa'am
NK037(ji)017:18: sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad mu khyud dang bcas pa
NK037(ji)017:19: bri / de'i steng du 'bru sna'i phye la rin
NK037(ji)017:20: po che brdar ba'i rten gtor khang bzang sum brtsegs
NK037(ji)017:21: ma'i tshul du byas pa bkod /
NK037(ji)017:22: de'i g.yas su bum gdan pad+ma 'dab bzhi'i tshom bu'i khar bum pa bcud ldan /
NK037(ji)017:23: g.yon du mchog gtor zlum po gtso 'khor dgu pa /
NK037(ji)017:24: rgyab tu stegs mtho bar yi dam gyi 'bul gtor /
NK037(ji)017:25: mdun du chu gnyis nyer spyod lnga sogs mchod pa'i yo byad /
NK037(ji)017:26: phyag mtshan dang spyan gzigs sogs nye bar mkho ba
NK037(ji)017:27: thams cad ci bde bar bkod cing tshogs par bya'o
NK037(ji)017:28: // gnyis pa sgrub pa'i thabs ni /
NK037(ji)017:29: khrus byas gos bzang po gyon nas stan la 'dug ste /
NK037(ji)017:32: gsang ba'i bdag po'i bdag bskyed bzlas pa dang bcas pa sngon du 'gro bas /
NK037(ji)017:34: stong pa'i ngang las mdun gyi nam mkhar lcang lo
NK037(ji)017:35: can gyi dga' ba'i tshal chen po'i dbus su b+h+r+aum
NK037(ji)017:36: las rin po che'i gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo
NK037(ji)017:37: bzhi rta babs dang ldan pa phyogs bzhir ka ba
NK037(ji)017:38: nyis stong lnga brgya lnga brgyas btegs pa'i khor yug
NK037(ji)017:42: byang dzam bu chu bo'i gser las grub pa dbyibs
NK037(ji)017:43: legs shing lta na sdug pa rgyan thams cad kyis
NK037(ji)017:44: spras pa'i dbus su rin po che sna bdun gyi
NK037(ji)017:45: khang bzang sum brtsegs su yod pa /
NK037(ji)017:46: sa 'og tu gter gyi khang pa bco lnga dang bcas shing /
NK037(ji)017:47: khor sa rim pa gsum gyis bskor ba'i dang po'i
NK037(ji)017:48: phyogs mtshams brgyad du khang bzang brgyad kyis mdzes pa
NK037(ji)017:49: / de dag gi phyi rol du rin po che'i phung po /
NK037(ji)017:53: khrus rdzing me tog dang ldan pa rnams spel mar
NK037(ji)017:54: gnas pa'i phyi nang rin po che'i ra ba gru
NK037(ji)017:56: pho brang dbus ma'i nang du sna tshogs pad+ma dang
NK037(ji)017:57: nyi ma seng ge la gnas pa'i bee ser po'i
NK037(ji)017:58: 'phro 'du las rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras
NK037(ji)017:59: sku mdog gser btso ma lta bu zhal gcig phyag
NK037(ji)017:60: gnyis pa / g.yas rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sgreng
NK037(ji)017:61: zhing g.yon nor bu skyug pa'i ne'u le 'dzin pa
NK037(ji)017:62: gnyis pa / / brjid bag dang bcas pa'i sku
NK037(ji)017:63: la lha'i dar sna tshogs pa'i na bza' lhab lhub
NK037(ji)017:64: gnyis pa / / tu gsol zhing / rin po
NK037(ji)017:65: che'i thor tshugs dbu rgyan sogs rgyan thams cad kyis
NK037(ji)017:66: gnyis pa / / tu gsol zhing / spras pa
NK037(ji)017:67: / zhabs g.yon brkyang ba'i rol pa'i stabs kyis seng
NK037(ji)017:68: ge dkar mo nyal stabs su gnas pa'i steng na
NK037(ji)017:69: gnyis pa / / tu gsol zhing / spras pa
NK037(ji)017:70: / bzhugs pa / nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi barji
NK037(ji)017:71: can nam mkha'i mdzod la mnga' brnyes shing skye rgu
NK037(ji)017:72: rnams phongs pa las sgrol ba /
NK037(ji)017:73: phrag gong nyi zlas brgyan pa /
NK037(ji)017:74: btsun mo sras dang pho nya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba /
NK037(ji)017:75: phyogs mtshams kyi khang brtsegs brgyad kyi shar nas rim
NK037(ji)017:76: pa bzhin dzam b+ha la ser po rin po che
NK037(ji)017:77: 'dzin pa / yang dag shes ser po gser gyi gri ring 'dzin pa /
NK037(ji)017:78: gang ba bzang po ser po bum pa 'dzin pa /
NK037(ji)017:80: nor bu bzang po dkar bo nor bu 'dzin pa /
NK037(ji)017:81: lngas rtsen ser skya khang brtsegs 'dzin pa /
NK037(ji)017:82: ku be ra nag po ral gri 'dzin pa /
NK037(ji)017:83: 'jam po 'khyil ba dkar po gri phub 'dzin pa
NK037(ji)017:84: ste thams cad kyang g.yon gter gyi ne'u le bsnams
NK037(ji)017:85: shing rang mdog dang mtshungs pa'i rta la chibs pa
NK037(ji)017:86: / brjid cing dpa' ba dar dang rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
NK037(ji)017:87: 'khor sa bar ma na klu chen brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa /
NK037(ji)017:88: 'khor sa tha ma na lha ma srin sde brgyad
NK037(ji)017:89: sogs ci bgyi'i pho nya bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
NK037(ji)017:90: tshogs rnam 'gyur sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang cha lugs
NK037(ji)017:91: can phrin las rab 'byams la dbang 'byor bas 'dod
NK037(ji)017:92: pa'i dngos grub char bzhin du 'bebs pa nam mkha'
NK037(ji)017:93: la sprin phung gtibs pa bzhin 'khod par gyur /
NK037(ji)017:95: h'u las 'od zer 'phros pas lcang lo can gyi
NK037(ji)017:96: pho brang nas rgyal po chen po 'khor dang bcas
NK037(ji)017:97: pa spyan drangs par bsam zhing /
NK037(ji)017:98: tsan+dana dkar dmar ga bur spos dkar a ka ru
NK037(ji)017:99: ba lu'i phye rnams sbyar ba'i spos bsreg cing rol
NK037(ji)017:101: bee ri rab lhun po'i byang phyogs nas //
NK037(ji)017:102: gnod sbyin rgyal po rnam thos sras //
NK037(ji)017:103: 'khor gyi gnod sbyin tshogs dang bcas //
NK037(ji)017:104: thugs dam dbang gis gshegs su gsol //
NK037(ji)017:105: bee sh+ra ma na ye sa pa ri w+aa sa
NK037(ji)017:106: ma ya hrim hrim dzahdzah dzahh+aum bam hoh bee s+w+aa
NK037(ji)017:107: h+aa / bee sh+ra ma n+aa ya +aa kar+sha ya dzah zhes dang /
NK037(ji)017:108: bee ring po mig 'dzum so gnyis kyi yun tshad du brjod pas spyan drangs /
NK037(ji)017:109: rat+na mu ku ta a b+hi shiny+tsa mi /
NK037(ji)017:110: zhes cod pan gyis dbang bskur /
NK037(ji)017:112: ri rab chen po'i gzhal yas 'dir //
NK037(ji)017:113: nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan khri la //
NK037(ji)017:114: gnod sbyin rgyal po 'khor dang bcas //
NK037(ji)017:115: bstan pa bsrung phyir bzhugs su gsol //
NK037(ji)017:118: gsang bdag gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas //
NK037(ji)017:119: dam tshig can gyi lha tshogs la //
NK037(ji)017:120: gnyis med dang ba'i tshul gyis ni //
NK037(ji)017:121: rtse gcig gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
NK037(ji)017:122: a ti p+au hoh pra t+ai ts+tsha hohn mo /
NK037(ji)017:125: gsang bdag gnod sbyin chen po 'khor bcas la //
NK037(ji)017:126: spos dang me tog mar me zhal zas dang //
NK037(ji)017:127: sil snyan rnga chen byug pa mchod pa'i sprin //
NK037(ji)017:128: dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis sprul pas mchod //
NK037(ji)017:129: badz+ra ar+g+ham p+aa d+yam push+pe d+h+au pe +aa lo ke
NK037(ji)017:130: gan+d+he nee wi d+ya shap+da p+au dza me g+ha sa
NK037(ji)017:131: mu dra s+pha ra na sa ma ye h'u /
NK037(ji)017:135: ri rgyal lhun po'i byang phyogs lcang lo can //
NK037(ji)017:136: rin chen mdzes pa'i pho brang chen po ni //
NK037(ji)017:137: shar phyogs shel las grub pas dkar zhing 'tsher //
NK037(ji)017:138: lho phyogs beed+aur+ya ste mthing zhing 'tsher //
NK037(ji)017:139: nub phyogs pad+ma r+aa ga dmar zhing dwangs //
NK037(ji)017:140: byang phyogs gser las grub pas gsal zhing mdzes //
NK037(ji)017:141: bla gor sgo la gser gyi pa tras brgyan //
NK037(ji)017:142: khang bzang lcog bzhi rin chen rgyal mtshan btsugs //
NK037(ji)017:143: rin chen pho brang longs spyod 'dod yon ldan //
NK037(ji)017:144: rin chen khri steng pany+tsa li k+aa'i gdan /
NK037(ji)017:146: gnod sbyin rgyal po rnam thos sras //
NK037(ji)017:147: sprin bral nyi ma'i gzi mdangs can //
NK037(ji)017:148: dar dang za 'og na bza' gsol //
NK037(ji)017:149: dbu la rin chen prog zhu mnab //
NK037(ji)017:150: phyag g.yas rin chen rgyal mtshan 'dzin //
NK037(ji)017:151: g.yon pa gter gyi ne'u le bsnams //
NK037(ji)017:152: zhal nas rin chen char ba 'bebs //
NK037(ji)017:153: thugs rjes phongs pa las sgrol mdzad //
NK037(ji)017:154: lha yi seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs //
NK037(ji)017:155: rin chen phreng bas rab brgyan cing //
NK037(ji)017:156: nam mkha'i mdzod la mnga' brnyes te //
NK037(ji)017:157: yid bzhin re skong rnam thos bu //
NK037(ji)017:159: kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan //
NK037(ji)017:160: sde bo che la stobs po che //
NK037(ji)017:161: gzhan gyi dpung rnams rab tu 'joms //
NK037(ji)017:162: gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che //
NK037(ji)017:163: lha min g.yul rnams pham par mdzad //
NK037(ji)017:164: rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu //
NK037(ji)017:167: mi nus na gong gi gnas bstod bzhag pa'i /
NK037(ji)017:168: gnod sbyin rgyal po zhes pa man chad kyis kyang chog /
NK037(ji)017:169: yang spro zhing nus na 'khor mang gi sger bstod
NK037(ji)017:170: kyang bya ste sgrub yig rtsa ba las shes so
NK037(ji)017:172: rgyal po 'khor bcas kyi thugs kar nyi ma la
NK037(ji)017:173: gnas pa'i bee yig sngags kyis bskor ba bdag gi
NK037(ji)017:174: thugs ka'i 'od kyis bskul bas ci 'dod pa'i phrin
NK037(ji)017:175: las thogs med du sgrub par bsam la /
NK037(ji)017:178: bee sh+ra ma n+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK037(ji)017:181: p+aur+na b+ha d+r+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK037(ji)017:182: ma ni b+ha d+r+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK037(ji)017:183: ku be r+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK037(ji)017:184: guh+ya s+th+aa n+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK037(ji)017:186: pi tsi kun+da li ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK037(ji)017:187: 'khor gnod sbyin brgyad po rnams kyi sngags so //
NK037(ji)017:188: de ltar ci nus bzlas nas thun mthar gtor ma 'bul ba ni /
NK037(ji)017:190: stong pa'i ngang las las rin po che'i snod du
NK037(ji)017:191: kham las gtor ma bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho 'dod yon
NK037(ji)017:192: lnga'i sprin phung spro bar gyur /
NK037(ji)017:195: a k+aa ro sogs brjod pas byin gyis brlabs la /
NK037(ji)017:196: bee sh+ra ma na sa pa ri w+aa ra ma
NK037(ji)017:197: h+aa ba lim ta ma h+aa p+au dza kha kha
NK037(ji)017:199: zhes pa bdun gyis phul la /
NK037(ji)017:201: byang phyogs skyong ba'i rgyal chen rnam thos sras //
NK037(ji)017:202: gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes nas kyang //
NK037(ji)017:203: bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa la //
NK037(ji)017:204: bu sdug bzhin du skyong bar mdzod //
NK037(ji)017:205: bdag la gnod par sems pa dang //
NK037(ji)017:206: log par zhugs pa'i dgra tshogs rnams //
NK037(ji)017:207: de yi phru ma gzhom pa dang //
NK037(ji)017:208: gtan nas brlag pa'i phrin las mdzod //
NK037(ji)017:209: zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po yi //
NK037(ji)017:210: las rnams 'grub par mdzad du gsol //
NK037(ji)017:212: mthar gtang rag gi mchod bstod dang /
NK037(ji)017:213: yi ge brgya pas lhag chad bskang /
NK037(ji)017:215: dam tshig pa rang la bsdu /
NK037(ji)017:216: smon lam shing brjod ci rigs par bya'o //
NK037(ji)017:217: gsum pa rjes gnang gi cho ga ni /
NK037(ji)017:218: bdag bskyed kyi bzlas pa song rjes bum par gsang bdag bskyed /
NK037(ji)017:219: gnas gsum byin gyis brlabs nas ye shes pa gzhug /
NK037(ji)017:220: dbang bskur rigs bdag gis rgyas gdab /
NK037(ji)017:222: thugs ka'i sngags phreng gzugs thag la brten nas bum lha'i rgyud bskul /
NK037(ji)017:223: sku las bdud rtsi'i rgyun babs pas bum pa gang bar bsam nas /
NK037(ji)017:224: n+ai lam b+ha ra d+ha ra badz+ra p+aa ni h'u h'u phata phata s+w+aa h+aa /
NK037(ji)017:225: zhes pa brgya rtsa sogs bzlas nas lha bdud rtsir zhu /
NK037(ji)017:226: de nas mdun bskyed kyi sgrub mchod gtor ma 'bul ba yan chad sngar ltar byas /
NK037(ji)017:227: slob ma rnams khrus byas gos gsar pa gyon /
NK037(ji)017:229: chos bshad ci rigs pa las khyad par /
NK037(ji)017:230: de yang rgyal ba stong gi bka' sdod /
NK037(ji)017:231: bstan pa rab 'byams kyi srung ma /
NK037(ji)017:232: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnam thos sras
NK037(ji)017:233: zhes bya ba mthu stobs kyi dbang phyug chen po
NK037(ji)017:234: 'di nyid nges pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das gsang
NK037(ji)017:235: ba'i bdag po nyid dang rnam dbyer med cing /
NK037(ji)017:236: gnas skabs bstan pa skyong zhing sgrub pa po'i re
NK037(ji)017:237: 'dod skong ba'i ched du gnod sbyin dbang po'i skur
NK037(ji)017:238: bzhengs pa ste / de yang sngon ston pa lcang
NK037(ji)017:239: lo can rnam thos kyi bu'i gnas na bzhugs pa'i
NK037(ji)017:240: bzhengs pa ste / tshe / ngal gsos po'i bu gar mkhan mchog ston pa'i spyan sngar 'dug go //
NK037(ji)017:241: de nas rnam thos sras stan las langs nas ston
NK037(ji)017:242: pa la mchod cing rig sngags gsung bar gsol ba
NK037(ji)017:243: btab pa las / sngags dang sgrub thabs las tshogs
NK037(ji)017:244: dkyil 'khor sogs rgya cher bstan pa le'u bcu drug
NK037(ji)017:245: gi bdag nyid can gar mkhan mchog gi rtogs pa
NK037(ji)017:246: gsungs pa sogs grub pa'i slob dpon chen po du
NK037(ji)017:247: ma la bka' babs shing brgyud pa'i bka' gter gyi
NK037(ji)017:248: man ngag du ma zhig bzhugs pa las /
NK037(ji)017:249: 'dir gnyal pa nyi ma shes rab kyi gter ma dang 'brel ba /
NK037(ji)017:250: de la phyi lha ltar sgrub pa /
NK037(ji)017:251: nang ma mo ltar sgrub pa /
NK037(ji)017:252: gsang ba gshin rje ltar sgrub pa /
NK037(ji)017:253: yang gsang mkha' 'gro ltar sgrub pa ste bzhi las /
NK037(ji)017:254: 'dir phyi lha ltar sgrub pa sprin gseb ma'i skor du grags pa de yin /
NK037(ji)017:255: de yang sngon chos 'khor bsam yas su mnga' bdag
NK037(ji)017:256: khri srong lde'u btsan gyi sras mu khri btsan po
NK037(ji)017:257: mtha'i so kha srung ba'i dmag dpon du mngags pa'i
NK037(ji)017:258: tshe slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas sogs bla
NK037(ji)017:259: mchod rnams dbu rtse bar khang du spyan drangs mchod
NK037(ji)017:260: pa rgya chen pos mchod nas /
NK037(ji)017:262: yab rgyal po'i bzhed pa 'grub pa dang /
NK037(ji)017:263: bar chad med cing bde legs su 'gyur ba'i rten 'brel mdzad du gsol /
NK037(ji)017:264: zhes lha sras dang rgyal blon thams cad kyi gsol ba btab pa las /
NK037(ji)017:265: slob dpon chen pos de ltar bgyi'i zhes gsungs nas /
NK037(ji)017:266: skad cig de la rgyal po chen po rnam thos
NK037(ji)017:267: sras 'khor rta bdag brgyad las byed mgo brnyan gyi
NK037(ji)017:268: tshogs dang bcas pa nam mkha' gang ba mdun gyi
NK037(ji)017:270: rgyal po 'khor bcas la zhal dngos su bstan /
NK037(ji)017:271: der slob dpon gyis bka' bsgos shing dam la btags nas phrin las sgrub pa'i gnyer gtad /
NK037(ji)017:272: rgyal pos ji ltar gzigs pa'i bkod pa rnams mtha'
NK037(ji)017:273: mi mgon brtson gyis ri mor bkod pa la rab
NK037(ji)017:275: de nas rgyal pos mtha' bzhi'i dmag dpung rnams dbyar
NK037(ji)017:276: mo thang du 'tshogs pa'i dus tshigs bor ba las
NK037(ji)017:277: / der gzugs dang cha lugs rnam 'gyur sna tshogs pa'i dpung tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'dus /
NK037(ji)017:278: rgyal bus de rnams khrid de gru gu dang rgya dang hor gyi sgom grwa bar ba rnams bcom /
NK037(ji)017:279: dkor cha rnams khyer nas yab la phul /
NK037(ji)017:280: mthar rgyal bus slob dpon gyi drung du rdo rje
NK037(ji)017:281: theg pa'i man ngag nos nas nyams su blangs pas
NK037(ji)017:282: dngos grub thob / de lta bu'i rnam thos sras
NK037(ji)017:283: kyi bsnyen sgrub las tshogs dang bcas pa rnams o
NK037(ji)017:284: rgyan chen pos zab mo'i gnad du dril ba phyi
NK037(ji)017:285: rabs kyi don du sku 'bag dang lhan cig bya
NK037(ji)017:286: rgod gshongs su gter du sbas pa gnyal pa nyi
NK037(ji)017:287: ma shes rab kyis bton nas /
NK037(ji)017:288: snur nyi ma 'od zer sogs las rim bzhin brgyud
NK037(ji)017:289: pa'i rjes gnang zab mo sgrub pa la slob dpon
NK037(ji)017:290: gyi bya ba rnams sngon du song slob ma'i bya
NK037(ji)017:291: ba man+dala phul nas gsol ba gdab pa /
NK037(ji)017:292: byang chub rdo rje'i sangs rgyas la //
NK037(ji)017:293: ji ltar mchod cing gsol ba ltar //
NK037(ji)017:294: bdag kyang rab tu bskyab pa'i phyir //
NK037(ji)017:295: gsang bdag 'khor bcas deng bdag stsol //
NK037(ji)017:296: zhes lan gsum gyis gsol btab /
NK037(ji)017:297: rgyun bshags gang 'os kyis tshogs bsags /
NK037(ji)017:298: de nas slob ma la phyag rdor gyi mngon rtogs phog /
NK037(ji)017:299: mdun gyi gtor ma mdun bskyed bzhin gsal btab gnas gsum brlab /
NK037(ji)017:300: h'u gi 'od zer gyis ye shes pa spyan 'dren cing spos sreg rol mo'i sgra sbyar /
NK037(ji)017:301: ar+g+ham nas shap+da'i bar gyis mchod cing bstod pa bya /
NK037(ji)017:302: de nas bum pa spyi bor bzhag /
NK037(ji)017:303: sku gsung thugs las byung ba yi //
NK037(ji)017:304: ye shes dam tshig dri ma med //
NK037(ji)017:305: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
NK037(ji)017:306: bdag gis mngon par dbang bskur ro //
NK037(ji)017:307: badz+ra p+aa ni a b+hi shiny+tsa tu mam /
NK037(ji)017:308: zhes bum chu lha'i ngo bo ye shes bdud rtsis
NK037(ji)017:309: lus gang dri ma dag chu'i lhag ma spyi bor
NK037(ji)017:310: 'khyil ba las rigs bdag gis dbu brgyan par bsam
NK037(ji)017:312: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab basngagasa pa'i //
NK037(ji)017:313: dbu rgyan dbang bskur sbyin par bya //
NK037(ji)017:314: rat+na mu ku ta a b+hi shiny+tsa t+r+aam /
NK037(ji)017:316: de nas dpon slob gnyis ka phyag rdor du gsal ba'i thugs kar zla ba la h'u /
NK037(ji)017:317: bla ma'i thugs ka nas 'od 'phros mdun bskyed rgyal po'i thugs rgyud bskul /
NK037(ji)017:318: de'i thugs ka nas sngags kyi phreng ba byung ba'i
NK037(ji)017:319: 'od kyis don gnyis byas 'jig rten khams kyi dngos
NK037(ji)017:320: grub thams cad bsdus te sngags phreng la thim /
NK037(ji)017:321: de nyid slob ma'i khar zhugs snying ga'i h'u gi mthar lan gsum du 'khod par bsam la /
NK037(ji)017:322: phyag rdor gyi sngags sngon du 'gro bas /
NK037(ji)017:323: gtso bo'i snying po dang nye snying brgya rtsa brgyad /
NK037(ji)017:324: 'khor rnams kyi sngags gsum sogs rjes zlos byas la /
NK037(ji)017:325: slob mas slob dpon la me tog 'thor zhing /
NK037(ji)017:326: sngags bdag bdag la stsal lags kyis //
NK037(ji)017:327: sngags bdag bdag la byin gyis rlobs //
NK037(ji)017:329: slob dpon gyis me tog spyi bor bzhag la /
NK037(ji)017:330: sngags bdag 'di la stsal lags kyis //
NK037(ji)017:331: sngags bdag 'di la byin gyis rlobs //
NK037(ji)017:332: lan gsum gyis byin gyis brlab /
NK037(ji)017:333: de nas slar yang man+dala phul la //
NK037(ji)017:334: byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la //
NK037(ji)017:335: mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba ltar //
NK037(ji)017:336: bdag kyang skyob pa'i don gyi phyir //
NK037(ji)017:337: ci 'dod dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK037(ji)017:339: slob ma gsang bdag gi nga rgyal brtan po bskyed du bcug la /
NK037(ji)017:340: gtor ma snying ga'am lag par gtad de /
NK037(ji)017:341: mdun bskyed las mar me gcig las gnyis chad kyi tshul du byon /
NK037(ji)017:342: snying ga nas sib kyis thim pas lus dang grib ma'i tshul du bzhugs par bsam la /
NK037(ji)017:343: bla ma brgyud pa'i mtshan nas brjod cing bka' bsgo
NK037(ji)017:344: dang sngags rnams drag por brjod cing sbyar spos kyi
NK037(ji)017:345: dud pa dang rol mo'i sgra bya'o //
NK037(ji)017:346: de nas bka' bsgo ba ni /
NK037(ji)017:347: deng nas bzung ste bu khyod kyis dpal phyag na
NK037(ji)017:348: rdo rje dang rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras
NK037(ji)017:349: 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bsgom pa dang bzlas pa'i
NK037(ji)017:350: sgo nas yi dam chos skyong gtso bor zung zhig
NK037(ji)017:352: rgyal mtshan lag g.yas su gtad la /
NK037(ji)017:353: rin chen rgyal mtshan nor bu'i tog gis spras //
NK037(ji)017:354: bdud kyi dgra las rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan 'di //
NK037(ji)017:355: sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung phyir btad par bya //
NK037(ji)017:356: mi mthun phyogs las rgyal phyir bzung bar gyis //
NK037(ji)017:357: ne'u le g.yon du gtad la /
NK037(ji)017:358: rin chen du ma'i gter gyi ne'u le 'di //
NK037(ji)017:359: bsam 'phel yid bzhin nor bu du ma'i gter //
NK037(ji)017:360: 'gro kun phongs pa'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir //
NK037(ji)017:361: skal ldan khyod kyis bzung la spyad par gyis //
NK037(ji)017:362: zhes phyag mtshan gyi rjes gnang ngo //
NK037(ji)017:363: deng nas bzung ste dus thams cad du mchod gtor la brtson pa dang /
NK037(ji)017:364: ji ltar bshad pa'i dam tshig rnams bsrung ba la brtson par gyis shig /
NK037(ji)017:366: gtso bos ji ltar sogs kyis khas blangs /
NK037(ji)017:367: man+dala yon 'bul rnams spyi dang 'dra zhing /
NK037(ji)017:368: mdun bskyed kyi rjes chog kyang gong du bstan pa bzhin no //
NK037(ji)017:369: bsnyen sgrub dang las sbyor gyi man ngag zab mo rnams ni rtsa ba'i gzhung las shes par bya'o //
NK037(ji)017:370: zhi sogs rnam 'gyur grangs med pas /
NK037(ji)017:371: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin du //
NK037(ji)017:372: bstan skyong rnams mang thos sras kyi //
NK037(ji)017:373: sgrub thabs rjes gnang ngo mtshar rmad //
NK037(ji)017:374: rnam sras ser chen sprin gseb ma'i sgrub thabs rjes
NK037(ji)017:375: gnang dang bcas pa'i le'u tshan gter chen 'gyur med
NK037(ji)017:376: rdo rje'i gsung sgrub thabs 'dod 'jo'i bum bzang las
